20110112164257.000|20110112164258.000|CC1|YOU DON'T NECESSARILY NEED TO   
20110112164258.000|20110112164259.000|CC1|USE THE EGGS.                   
20110112164259.000|20110112164306.000|CC1|I'LL MAKE A SIMPLE VERSION.     
20110112164306.000|20110112164306.000|CC1|MY FAVORITE FLAVOR OF ICE CREAM 
20110112164306.000|20110112164307.000|CC1|IS BANANA CHOCOLATE CHIP.       
20110112164307.000|20110112164308.000|CC1|THIS IS MY COMFORT FOOD.        
20110112164308.000|20110112164310.000|CC1|A SIMPLE, QUICK VERSION.        
20110112164310.000|20110112164313.000|CC1|THREE BANANAS IN A BLENDER.     
20110112164313.000|20110112164317.000|CC1|THIS IS A GREAT WAY TO USE SORT 
20110112164317.000|20110112164319.000|CC1|OF ALMOST TOO RIPE BANANAS AS   
20110112164319.000|20110112164320.000|CC1|WELL.

20110112164325.000|20110112164326.000|CC1|EXTRACT AND THEN SOME MILK.     
20110112164326.000|20110112164327.000|CC1|>> WHOLE MILK?
